Factsheet

Developer:
Outer Brain Studios
Based in Seattle, USA
Release date:
28 April, 2022
Platforms:
Steam
Website:
outerbrainstudios.com
Regular Price:
USD 17.99

Description

Slash your way through dark, ever-changing lands in this new blend of roguelike and shared-world adventure. Create your adventurer and traverse the Trail of Bones: a perilous journey where all players’ choices alter the twisted landscape. Will you beg for forgiveness?

Features

  • Real time dungeon action, with turn-based map exploration.
  • Permanent death, but a persistent world - every player's impact on the world remains.
  • Loot-driven gameplay: your loot will tell a story which other players can see.
  • Unique Guilt gameplay mechanism - the less guilty you are, the longer you may survive.
  • Rich dark fantasy inspired by Slavic folklore and real history.
